data.Sentence_cn: 整个村子很快知道，有一大笔钱丢失了。
data.Sentence: The whole village soon learnt that a large sum of money had been lost.

data.Sentence_cn: 当地的屠户萨姆.本顿在把存款送往邮局的途中把钱包丢了。
data.Sentence: Sam Benton, the local butcher, had lost his wallet while taking his savings to the post office.

data.Sentence_cn: 萨姆确信那钱包一定是被某个村民捡到了，可是却不见有人来送还给他。
data.Sentence: Sam was sure that the wallet must have been found by one of the villagers, but it was not returned to him.

data.Sentence_cn: 3个月过去了，后来在一天早晨，萨姆在自己的大门外发现了他的钱包。
data.Sentence: Three months passed, and then one morning, Sam found his wallet outside his front door.

data.Sentence_cn: 钱包是用报纸包着的，里面有他丢失的钱的一半，
data.Sentence: It had been wrapped up in newspaper and it contained half the money he had lost,

data.Sentence_cn: 而且还附着一张纸条，上面写着：“一个小偷，是的，但只是一个50%的小偷！”
data.Sentence: together with a note which said:"A thief, yes, but only 50 per cent a thief!"

data.Sentence_cn: 而且还附着一张纸条，上面写着：“一个小偷，是的，但只是一个50%的小偷！”
data.Sentence: Two months later, some more money was sent to Sam with another note:"Only 25 per cent a thief now!"

data.Sentence_cn: 很快，萨姆全部的钱都用同样的方式还了回来。
data.Sentence: In time, all Sam’s money was paid back in this way.

data.Sentence_cn: 最后的那张字条上写道：“我现在是一个100%的诚实人了！
data.Sentence: The last note said:"I am 100 per cent honest now!"
